授業目的: The purpose of the course is to provide students the oppoerunity to learn about the various social-economic models in Europe and their changes and their challenges they face with respect to the proceeding European integration. The main questions students will discuss in class wiil be, in which way socio-economic models differ and what implications this has on companies and company management.
到達目標:
Students are expected to require a profound knowledge of different socio-economic models in Europe and how they are changing due to European integration. Further students should be able to understand the relation between the institutional framework and company
Evaluation of students' performance will be based on: 60% participation and contribution to the course and 40% final student presentation.
授業方法: Face-to-face in-class lectures. Students, who can not participate in person, will be able to participate in the course online! PPP presentation and class discussion; the course's conception follows a seminar approach
